title: Support Braum looking for an ADC in BRONZE
body:
Hi
I am an Ashe one trick who has managed to climb to the modest rank of silver 4.
Playing Ashe and getting an awesome Braum support who is as friendly as Braum IRL is the best experience you can have IMO.

So I have made a second account BraumMustache to start one tricking Braum and I am looking for a ADC willing to one trick Ashe who believes they are unjustly 'stuck' in bronze.

 Please bring a positive mental attitude, be willing to listen and conduct real talk.

replies.body: Feel free to add me. Im a jinx main and love a Braum sup, Ive got a mate who is a Braum main and a really good sup.
You ain't gonna find a OTP Ashe. Ever.

> [{quoted}](name=Quinncest,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=6BAQfemd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-09-05T03:47:26.670+0000)
>
> You ain't gonna find a OTP Ashe. Ever.

And if you're playing Braum, Ezreal syngerises better.

I think theirs a lot of people saying there stuck in bronze for alot of reasons , but thats mostly because there are a few people on there party that dont want to get out of bronze or even like being in it
